A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In 2.5 hours they ruined over 40 years of amazing work. The last 2 Disney Movies where excellent! Last Jedi was terrible! Almost every thing about it was bad. Every decision is the movie \, in regards to the plot and story was taken in the wrong direction. Why would you show Luke sky walker fishing? There is a million other things I wanted to him do. There was soooo many stupid scenes and comedic lines that did not work. I still can’t figure out how they screwed up sooo badly. They need to remake the movie. If there is enough footage hopefully the can try to re-edit it. Princess Leia flying was the beginning of the end for me.
